about.title: About
about.name: 蔡尚儒
about.description: I am a developer who loves technology, focusing on frontend and full-stack development.
about.bio:
I initially learned Minecraft Server on my own because I wanted to play games with friends, which introduced me to server architecture and network technology for the first time. Before encountering IoT in high school classes, I developed a deep interest in technology and began learning about frontend and backend development.

In this process, I mastered Django and Flask for backend development, and used React, Swift, and Flutter for frontend development. I also used Nginx to name websites and AWS to build a real-time video streaming service platform. Additionally, I used Docker to containerize applications to improve development and deployment efficiency.

In competitions, I was mainly responsible for IoT-related circuit design and program development, such as power supply solutions and relay control. In the future, I would like to develop smart applications that combine IoT and AI to solve real problems, and deepen my research on high-performance backend architecture and distributed system technologies.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description1: Supported assembly operations for precision equipment such as FT-Handler and CP-Prober
experience.description2: Participated in logistics processes including package sorting, cargo handling, and warehouse organization
experience.description3: Supported refueling and calculation tasks, accumulated field service experience through contact with various customers

education.title: Education
education.school: National Kaohsiung University of Science and Technology
education.description: Focused on network security and artificial intelligence research, developed an innovative AI DDOS defense system as a graduation project. Actively participated in various competitions during studies, demonstrating professional skills and teamwork abilities.

achievement.title: Achievements
achievement.title1: Technical Cup Hackathon Competition (Southern Regional Preliminary)
achievement.description1: Developed an energy-saving solution that automatically controls air conditioning according to classroom schedules, achieving energy savings and cost efficiency.
achievement.description3: Proposed a campus smart cooling system to improve classroom environment comfort and energy efficiency.
achievement.title4: Feng Chai University 112th Academic Year Innovation Creative iDEA Presentation Competition
achievement.description4: Exhibited a vision of future technological development and creative ideas through an innovative presentation format.
achievement.title6: Technical Cup Hackathon Competition (Southern Regional Preliminary)
achievement.description6: Developed a 'Mountain Rescue Box' with real-time rescue and location verification functions to support quick rescue of distressed individuals.
achievement.title8: Sun Yat-sen Medical University National University Innovation, Creativity, and Entrepreneurship Competition
achievement.description8: After in-depth interviews with highland tea farmers, designed a smart agriculture solution to improve tea production and quality.
achievement.description9: Developed a campus indoor navigation system to help new students quickly find classrooms and resources.
achievement.title10: National High School Electrical and Electronic Group 111th Year Professional Topic and Creative Production Competition
achievement.description10: Designed a smart voice-controlled desk lamp combining voice modules and power-saving features.
achievement.title11: National High School Industrial Series Student Skills Competition
achievement.description11: Implemented industrial electronic control applications with STM32 as the core.
